Reviews.Title: “Really good value, spotless, but not near centre”
Reviews.Author: Mike A
Reviews.Content: march 28 2012 night holiday quiet safe parking excellent en suite breakfast pool public ex unused bar 10 min bus ride cafes etc food times disadvantage near centre getting takes age airport 65 buy roma pass airport tourist office otherwise buy metrobus tickets tobacconist opposite office bought day day pass taxi hotel value theres 4 bus shuttle 4 termini stop train termini pricey metro below slow train ostiense station 8 euro walk pyramids metro metro line termini termini switch line towards anagnina outside station bus past corner restaurant towards torre maura 10 minute ride 2 stops past petrol station petrol station left 100 metres hotel 100 metres left corner restaurant happy hour 2030 food plus drink 10 euros

Reviews.Title: “When is a hotel in Rome not a hotel in Rome?”
Reviews.Author: SmiffyWorthing
Reviews.Content: hotel modern clean comfortable staff helpful spoke english thats stuff supposedly 4 stars hotel situated city centre residential suburb rome miles airport whilst clean comfortable amazed teacoffee facilities im concerned surely standard feature days 4 coat hangers drawer space extractor fan internal bathroom shower gel mean toilet rolls drinks cabinet housed soft drinks water chilled found pointless kitchen facility lunch dinner situated residential restaurants nearby supermarket door breakfast continental hot food available scrambled egg pieces bacon mixed frankfurters vegetarian couldnt eat days eating breakfast cheese roll live dining cold impersonal utilitarian canteen restaurant subterranean natural light lacked warmth atmosphere hot water 2 3 days top checked informed pay city taxes 3 euros person night 4 star hotel wouldnt stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Inconvenient & soulless”
Reviews.Author: ManchesterMary01
Reviews.Content: inconvenient location city break beyond stayed 3 nights woken comings goings travellers 2 facilities apart breakfast supermarket door local eatery bar closed 2 visits 3 clean top bed cover stained 3 star appropriate disappointing

Reviews.Title: “Boom time build to bust...”
Reviews.Author: anthonyruk
Reviews.Content: typical design airport hotel cheap located middle rome suburb close ciampino airport staying meeting located nearby otherwise suspicious operator claiming rome hotel youre looking access rome city spotless beds thin mattress comfortable bathroom looked built 60 minute makeover fittings secure aligned spotlessly clean check staff friendly courteous wifi 4 euro bargain mainly close ciampino airport built building boom lots borrowed investment todays tough environment taxi waiting time minimum 10 mins persuading taxi driver fco task rome

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel !”
Reviews.Author: Worldtoddler
Reviews.Content: stayed summer 4 nights mum loved stylish cool breakfast ok italy bit center price paid middle season cool nice staff design recommend hotel friends

Reviews.Title: “UK Travellers Beware!”
Reviews.Author: g g
Reviews.Content: stayed nights october 2011 despite told travel agent fine public transport hotel outside centre arrival termini station found people hotel told conflicting advice tourist information boards bus drivers advised 5 tram told 800 meters hotel tram found hopelessly lost heard hotel road italian walked hour people directions behalf stall holder called taxi 4 exhausting hours landing arrived hotel day taxi centre found returning hotel afternoon taxi drivers didn’t hotel didn’t travel distance hotel vu hotel okay booked tour operator paid prices hotel website breakfast okay continental breakfasts clean daily housekeeping sound proof reception staff friendly concerned practicalities travel public transport evening meals nonexistent proper meal hotel 3 stars 4 buying train tickets remember validate tickets buy yellow machines prior getting train fined 25 euros person

Reviews.Title: “Good rooms, but far from the center”
Reviews.Author: broccoli_lover
Reviews.Content: stay 3 nights artis hotel triple size breakfast average hotel restaurant hotel loungebar downstairs night restaurants nearby bus stop 10 min walking hotel termini ride 40 min bus people buy ticket bus bus stop location residencial center

Reviews.Title: “good hotel, but a long way from the centre”
Reviews.Author: thetaxwoman
Reviews.Content: driving rome found hotel easily using sat nav plenty parking pleasant facilities smart absolutely complaints accommodation breakfast wasnt write home especially easter weekend supply fresh bread fruit plentiful provided fuel till lunchtime staff helpful barman magdalena reception particular appeared speak little english couple didnt help rude unhelpful hotel doesnt serve except breakfast local eating walking distance found accepted cash main issue getting city centre hotel doesnt provide information public transport links arent easy despite assured wasnt miss bustram stop getting city proved difficult primarily heard hotel werent exactly taxi drivers reverted phoning hotel reception directions denying existed tourist information office wrong tram line local bars didnt proved adventure expensive public transport system found easy cheap summarise base yourself comfortable modern acceptable breakfast reasonable price breakfast night easter weekend 2011 prepare yourself plenty information buses trams youre taking taxi hotels address phone th driver

Reviews.Title: “It was ok”
Reviews.Author: FiddlegirlHull
Reviews.Content: fine confident public transport easy especially stay town 9 pm night bus metro closed breakfast ok lovely capuccinos served morning bar machine coffee horrible ok heels caused disturbance clicking

Reviews.Title: “stay away”
Reviews.Author: yael_11
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights read 4 star hotel reality 3 star hotel center bus rides 15 minutes 18 stops metro breakfast minimal cables computer internet sit lobby tables sit stuff unfriendly smiles hotel clean

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel on the outskirts of Rome.”
Reviews.Author: Soph1983
Reviews.Content: stayed 12th march 15th march fantastic cleaned daily fresh towels bedding breakfast little disappointing price stay ok pastries bread ham cheese cereals fo hotel middle bus ride metro follow directions hotel website metro line catch bus hotel door supermarket bottle €1 reception staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “brain new hotel”
Reviews.Author: peterfxn22
Reviews.Content: beautiful hotel renovated outskirts rome breakfast girlfriend near metro station 2012 price service worth stay senior afternoon bit pushy otherwise ok
